Blooded.description: This unit has survived its first battle. +1 to Nerve tests.

Battle-Hardened.description: This unit has proven itself in multiple engagements. +1 to hit rolls in Fight phase.

Honoured.description: This unit has brought glory to the Chapter. Can re-roll one hit roll per turn.

Legendary.description: This unit is spoken of in hushed tones. +1 Attack characteristic.

Relic Bearer.description: This unit carries an ancient relic into battle. +1 to save rolls.

Marked for Greatness.description: This unit is destined for glory. Gains an additional Warlord Trait.

Master-crafted Weapon.description: One weapon becomes master-crafted. Re-roll damage rolls of 1.

Venerable Weapon.description: An ancient weapon of great power. +1 to wound rolls.

Blessed Weapon.description: Weapon blessed by the Emperor. Deals mortal wounds on 6s to wound.

Relic Weapon.description: A legendary weapon of immense power. +1 Strength, +1 AP.

Artificer Weapon.description: Perfectly crafted weapon. +1 to hit rolls.

Psyker.description: This unit manifests psychic powers. Knows one additional psychic power.

Psychic Mastery.description: Master of the warp. +1 to cast rolls, knows 2 additional powers.

Warp Sight.description: Can see beyond the veil. Ignores cover when shooting.

Mind Shield.description: Protected from psychic attack. 5+ invulnerable save against psychic attacks.

Psychic Familiar.description: Accompanied by a psychic creature. Re-roll failed psychic tests.
